config module¶

class config.Config¶

Bases: object

This class defines common global configuration options in the form of environment variables.

FLASK_APP = 'main.py'¶
SECRET_KEY = 'GameOfThreads'¶
SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI = 'sqlite:///C:\\Personal\\Programming\\Python Environments\\FinalProjectGOT\\app.db'¶
SQLALCHEMY_TRACK_MODIFICATIONS = False¶
